segments.text: My attention is drawn to the two children near the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is quite daring, climbing onto that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched up, reaching deep into the "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cookies clearly, they look quite tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it's really tilted backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall at any second, and that thought makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, hand raised, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are working together, completely absorbed in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amusing how focused they are on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't completely tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink has no idea what mischief is unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a ticking time bomb of small accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an incredibly risky way to get a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR
